# Enforce schema model names to follow the configured TypeScript style (`@v2nic/prisma/schema-model-name-style`)

<!-- end auto-generated rule header -->

## Options

<!-- begin auto-generated rule options list -->

| Name           | Type     | Choices                                                           | Default       |
| :------------- | :------- | :---------------------------------------------------------------- | :------------ |
| `ignoreModels` | String[] |                                                                   | `[]`          |
| `style`        | String   | `snake_case`, `camel_case`, `pascal_case`, `screaming_snake_case` | `pascal_case` |

<!-- end auto-generated rule options list -->
